path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Coinfabrik/DreamTeam Smart Contracts Audit for Players' Compensation - CoinFabrik Blog.pdf

project_info.project_path: Experiments/contracts/DreamTeam Smart Contracts Audit for Players' Compensation - CoinFabrik Blog/smart-contracts

findings.title: Vesting mechanism does not emit Transfer events
findings.description: The _TDTT_ contract does not emit Transfer events when balances are assigned to token holders as a consequence of its vesting mechanism.

findings.title: Missing function qualifiers or misuse of them
findings.description: Fallback functions with higher gas cost than a transfer or send call allows. Underhanded or erroneous code. Code and contract interaction complexity. Wrong or missing error handling. Overuse of transfers in a single transaction instead of using withdrawal patterns. Insufficient coverage of function input requirements.

findings.title: Fallback functions with higher gas cost than a what a transfer or send call allows
findings.description: Fallback functions have higher gas costs than allowed by transfer or send calls.

findings.title: Code and contract interaction complexity
findings.description: The audit report highlights the complexity of code and contract interactions as a potential security risk.

findings.title: Wrong or missing error handling
findings.description: Missing or incorrect implementation of error handling mechanisms in smart contracts.

findings.title: Overuse of transfers in a single transaction instead of using withdrawal patterns
findings.description: Using multiple transfers in a single transaction can lead to higher gas costs and potential security issues, instead consider implementing withdrawal patterns.

findings.title: Insufficient coverage of function input requirements
